channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [MCHECKSTYLE-129] Unable To Load configLocation From URL
item.project: Maven Checkstyle Plugin (Moved to GitHub Issues)
item.description: With maven-checkstyle-plugin 2.5, I can no longer specify a URL in the configLocation.
item.summary: Unable To Load configLocation From URL

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Here is an example project showing the failure. If you execute
mvn clean site

you get this output

[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Building checkstyle-new
[INFO]    task-segment: [clean, site]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] [clean:clean {execution: default-clean}]
[INFO] [site:site {execution: default-site}]
[INFO] Generating "Project Team" report.
[INFO] Generating "Issue Tracking" report.
[INFO] Generating "Checkstyle" report.
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] BUILD ERROR
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Error during page generation

Embedded error: Error rendering Maven report: Failed during checkstyle execution
Could not find resource 'http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/maven/plugins/tags/maven-checkstyle-plugin-2.5/src/main/resources/config/sun_checks.xml'.
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] For more information, run Maven with the -e switch
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time: 5 seconds
[INFO] Finished at: Sat Feb 13 10:38:18 CST 2010
[INFO] Final Memory: 27M/135M
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------

The checkstyle-old.zip attachment shows an identical project using maven-checkstyle-plugin 2.4. When executing
mvn clean site
on this project, the report is successfully generated.

[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Building checkstyle-old
[INFO]    task-segment: [clean, site]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] [clean:clean {execution: default-clean}]
[INFO] [site:site {execution: default-site}]
[INFO] Generating "Project Team" report.
[INFO] Generating "Issue Tracking" report.
[INFO] Generating "Checkstyle" report.
[WARNING] File encoding has not been set, using platform encoding Cp1252, i.e. build is platform dependent!
[INFO] There are 12 checkstyle errors.
[WARNING] Unable to locate Source XRef to link to - DISABLED
[INFO] Generating "Continuous Integration" report.
[INFO] Generating "Project Plugins" report.
[INFO] Generating "Dependencies" report.
[INFO] Generating "Plugin Management" report.
[INFO] Generating "Mailing Lists" report.
[INFO] Generating "Source Repository" report.
[INFO] Generating "Project Summary" report.
[INFO] Generating "About" report.
[INFO] Generating "Project License" report.
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD SUCCESSFUL
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time: 10 seconds
[INFO] Finished at: Sat Feb 13 10:49:19 CST 2010
[INFO] Final Memory: 30M/128M
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------

the issue is in plexus-resources.
You can add a new version in the plugin dependencies

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.codehaus.plexus</groupId>
  <artifactId>plexus-resources</artifactId>
  <version>1.0-alpha-7-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>

Just adding the plexus-resources dependency doesn't seem to be enough, Maven can't find it. Maybe there is a problem with http://repository.apache.org/snapshots though (I can't browse it right now). Do I need something else?
plexus snapshots are here http://oss.repository.sonatype.org/content/repositories/plexus-snapshots
Thanks.
fyi plexus-resources:1.0-alpha-7 has been released.

Please can someone more clearly show what is required here; either via a diff to the checkstyle-new.zip pom.xml, or a pointer to the relevant documentation showing how to override the dependency? Versions 2.5 and 2.6 of the maven checkstyle plugin have this issue when I try to use it locally.

You shouldn't need to do anything special besides update the version to 2.6. It worked for me after updating. Are you explicitly setting plugin version? (remembering that <version>s in <build> and <reporting> sections are configured separately) When you run with "-X", what version does it say you are using?

jira-importer opened a new issue, #204:
URL: https://github.com/apache/maven-checkstyle-plugin/issues/204

**[Allan Shoup](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=9gaqfk802@sneakemail.com)** opened **MCHECKSTYLE-129(https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MCHECKSTYLE-129?redirect=false)** and commented

With maven-checkstyle-plugin 2.5, I can no longer specify a URL in the configLocation.

—

*Affects:* 2.5

*Attachments:*

  • [checkstyle-new.zip](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12714674/checkstyle-new.zip) (3.09 kB)
  • [checkstyle-old.zip](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12714756/checkstyle-old.zip) (3.10 kB)

*Issue Links:*

  • MCHECKSTYLE-135(https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MCHECKSTYLE-135) Can't use a configFile with an URL
    (*"is duplicated by"*)

1 votes, 1 watchers

**[Olivier Lamy](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=olamy)** commented

the issue is in plexus-resources.
You can add a new version in the plugin dependencies

```xml
<dependency>
<groupId>org.codehaus.plexus</groupId>
<artifactId>plexus-resources</artifactId>
<version>1.0-alpha-7-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>
```
